Android:

preconditions:
1. install android sdk
2. set ANDROID_HOME path to "<android_home>/sdk/"
    - MAC:
        - open ~/.bash_profile/
        - export ANDROID_HOME=/Users/<<username>>/Library/Android/sdk
        - save & close the file

1. run build.sh in arsnova.click root dir
2. Enter Passphrase for keystore:  arsnova.click
